template.name: Docker by Zabbix agent 2 mbuz
template.description:
Get Docker engine metrics from plugin for the New Zabbix Agent (zabbix-agent2).
You can discuss this template or leave feedback on our forum https://www.zabbix.com/forum/zabbix-suggestions-and-feedback/435429-discussion-thread-for-official-zabbix-template-docker
Generated by official Zabbix template tool "Templator" 2.0.0

item.name: Docker: Containers paused
item.description: Total number of containers paused on this host.

item.name: Docker: Containers running
item.description: Total number of containers running on this host.

item.name: Docker: Containers stopped
item.description: Total number of containers stopped on this host.

item.name: Docker: Containers total
item.description: Total number of containers on this host.

item.name: Docker: Images total
item.description: Number of images with intermediate image layers.

trigger.name: Docker: Failed to fetch info data
trigger.event_name: Docker: Failed to fetch info data (or no data for 30m)
trigger.description: Zabbix has not received data for items for the last 30 minutes.

trigger.expression: last(/Docker by Zabbix agent 2 mbuz/docker.server_version,#1)<>last(/Docker by Zabbix agent 2 mbuz/docker.server_version,#2) and length(last(/Docker by Zabbix agent 2 mbuz/docker.server_version))>0
trigger.name: Docker: Version has changed
trigger.description: Docker version has changed. Acknowledge to close the problem manually.

discovery_rule.name: Containers discovery
discovery_rule.description:
Discovery of containers metrics.
Parameter: true - Returns all containers false - Returns only running containers

parameters.parameter: var input = JSON.parse(value); return truncatedTimestamp = Math.floor(Date.parse(input.Created) / 1000) || -1;

item_prototype.name: Container {#NAME}: Finished at
item_prototype.description: Time at which the container last terminated.

trigger_prototype.expression: last(/Docker by Zabbix agent 2 mbuz/docker.container_info.state.error["{#NAME}"],#1)<>last(/Docker by Zabbix agent 2 mbuz/docker.container_info.state.error["{#NAME}"],#2) and length(last(/Docker by Zabbix agent 2 mbuz/docker.container_info.state.error["{#NAME}"]))>0
trigger_prototype.name: Container {#NAME}: An error has occurred in the container
trigger_prototype.description: Container {#NAME} has an error. Acknowledge to close the problem manually.

trigger_prototype.name: Container {#NAME}: Health state container is unhealthy

item_prototype.name: Container {#NAME}: Get info
item_prototype.description: Return low-level information about a container.

item_prototype.name: Container {#NAME}: CPU kernelmode usage per second
Container {#NAME}: Throttled periods
item_prototype.description: Number of periods when the container hits its throttling limit.

item_prototype.name: Container {#NAME}: Throttled time
item_prototype.description: Aggregate time the container was throttled for in nanoseconds.

item_prototype.name: Container {#NAME}: Throttling periods
item_prototype.description: Number of periods with throttling active.

item_prototype.name: Container {#NAME}: CPU total usage per second
Container {#NAME}: CPU usermode usage per second
Container {#NAME}: Current PIDs count
item_prototype.description: Current number of PIDs the container has created.

item_prototype.name: Container {#NAME}: Get stats
item_prototype.description: Get container stats based on resource usage.

item_prototype.name: Container {#NAME}: Networks bytes received per second
Container {#NAME}: Networks incoming packets dropped per second
Container {#NAME}: Networks errors received per second
Container {#NAME}: Networks packets received per second
Container {#NAME}: Networks bytes sent per second
Container {#NAME}: Networks outgoing packets dropped per second
Container {#NAME}: Networks errors sent per second
Container {#NAME}: Networks packets sent per second

trigger_prototype.expression: last(/Docker by Zabbix agent 2 mbuz/docker.container_info.state.exitcode["{#NAME}"])>0 and last(/Docker by Zabbix agent 2 mbuz/docker.container_info.state.running["{#NAME}"])=0
trigger_prototype.name: Container {#NAME}: Container has been stopped with error code
